verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> vay-Hi came בִּשְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> bish-lo-Shim Now it came to pass in the thirtieth שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, year בָּֽרְבִיעִי֙ <WH7243> ba-re-vi-'I in the fourth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> ba-cha-mish-Shah [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh, [day] of the month וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I בְתֽוֹךְ־ <WH8432> ve-toch- as I [was] among הַגּוֹלָ֖ה <WH1473> hag-go-Lah the captives עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- was by נְהַר־ <WH5104> ne-har- by the river כְּבָ֑ר <WH3529> ke-Var; of Chebar נִפְתְּחוּ֙ <WH6605> nif-te-Chu were opened הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim, [that] the heavens וָאֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh and I saw מַרְא֥וֹת <WH4759> mar-'ot visions אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of God

בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> ba-cha-mish-Shah In the fifth לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הִ֚יא <WH1931> hi he הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> hash-sha-Nah year הַחֲמִישִׁ֔ית <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shit, which [was] the fifth לְגָל֖וּת <WH1546> le-ga-Lut captivity הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech of king יוֹיָכִֽין׃ <WH3112> yo-ya-Chin. Jehoiachin's

הָיֹ֣ה <WH1961> ha-Yoh came הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ha-Yah expressly דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְחֶזְקֵ֨אל <WH3168> ye-chez-Kel came expressly unto Ezekiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son בּוּזִ֧י <WH941> bu-Zi of Buzi הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> kas-Dim of the Chaldeans עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by נְהַר־ <WH5104> ne-har- by the river כְּבָ֑ר <WH3529> ke-Var; Chebar וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi came עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham and there יַד־ <WH3027> yad- and the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וָאֵ֡רֶא <WH7200> va-'E-re And I looked וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold ר֨וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach wind סְעָרָ֜ה <WH5591> se-'a-Rah A storm בָּאָ֣ה <WH935> ba-'Ah came מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַצָּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> hatz-tza-Fon, out of the north עָנָ֤ן <WH6051> 'a-Nan cloud גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> ga-dOl a great וְאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> ve-'Esh and a fire מִתְלַקַּ֔חַת <WH3947> mit-lak-Ka-chat, infolding וְנֹ֥גַֽהּ <WH5051> ve-No-gah itself and a brightness ל֖וֹ lo סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> sa-Viv; [was] about וּמִ֨תּוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> u-Mit-to-Chah, it and out of the midst כְּעֵ֥ין <WH5869> ke-'Ein thereof as the colour הַחַשְׁמַ֖ל <WH2830> ha-chash-Mal of amber מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch out of the midst הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> ha-'Esh. of the fire

וּמִ֨תּוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> u-Mit-to-Chah, Also out of the midst דְּמ֖וּת <WH1823> de-Mut thereof [came] the likeness אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' of four חַיּ֑וֹת <WH2416> chai-Yot; living creatures וְזֶה֙ <WH2088> ve-Zeh and this מַרְאֵֽיהֶ֔ן <WH4758> mar-'ei-Hen, And this [was] their appearance דְּמ֥וּת <WH1823> de-Mut had the likeness אָדָ֖ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of a man לָהֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> la-Hen-nah. they

וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah had four פָנִ֖ים <WH6440> fa-Nim faces לְאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> le-'e-Chat; And every one וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba' had four כְּנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> ke-na-Fa-yim wings לְאַחַ֥ת <WH259> le-'a-Chat and every one לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH7272> ve-rag-lei-Hem And their feet רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Re-gel feet יְשָׁרָ֑ה <WH3477> ye-sha-Rah; [were] straight וְכַ֣ף <WH3709> ve-Chaf and the sole רַגְלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH7272> rag-lei-Hem, of their feet כְּכַף֙ <WH3709> ke-Chaf [was] like the sole רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Re-gel foot עֵ֔גֶל <WH5695> 'E-gel, of a calf's וְנֹ֣צְצִ֔ים <WH5340> ve-No-tze-Tzim, and they sparkled כְּעֵ֖ין <WH5869> ke-'Ein like the colour נְחֹ֥שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet brass קָלָֽל׃ <WH7044> ka-Lal. of burnished

וְיָדֹו ve-ya-dov כוִידֵ֣י <WH3027> vi-Dei able קאָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of a man מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <WH8478> mit-Ta-chat Under כַּנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3671> kan-fei-Hem, under their wings עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> 'ar-Ba-'at on their four רִבְעֵיהֶ֑ם <WH7253> riv-'ei-Hem; sides וּפְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH6440> u-fe-nei-Hem had their faces וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3671> ve-chan-fei-Hem and their wings לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽם׃ <WH702> le-'ar-ba'-Tam. and they four

חֹֽבְרֹ֛ת <WH2266> choe-Rot [were] joined אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֲחוֹתָ֖הּ <WH269> a-cho-Tah to another כַּנְפֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3671> kan-fei-Hem; Their wings לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not יִסַּ֣בּוּ <WH5437> yis-Sab-bu they turned בְלֶכְתָּ֔ן <WH1980> ve-lech-Tan, moved אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> 'E-ver straight פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> pa-Nav forward יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> ye-Le-chu. went

וּדְמ֣וּת <WH1823> u-de-Mut As for the likeness פְּנֵיהֶם֮ <WH6440> pe-nei-Hem of their faces פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei had the face אָדָם֒ <WH120> 'a-Dam of a man וּפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> u-fe-Nei and the face אַרְיֵ֤ה <WH738> 'ar-Yeh of a lion אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on הַיָּמִין֙ <WH3225> hai-ya-Min on the right side לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֔ם <WH702> le-'ar-ba'-Tam, they four וּפְנֵי־ <WH6440> u-fe-nei- had the face שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> Shor of an ox מֵֽהַשְּׂמֹ֖אול <WH8040> me-has-se-Mol on the left side לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ן <WH702> le-'ar-ba'-Tan; and they four וּפְנֵי־ <WH6440> u-fe-nei- also had the face נֶ֖שֶׁר <WH5404> Ne-sher of an eagle לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽן׃ <WH702> le-'ar-ba'-Tan. they four
